title: Untitled
marks: Signature and Date LRC below image, in pencil: [Keith A. Smith  May 1
description: two nearly identical photographic images, one on top of the other; top image of three people seated on a bus--right figure shadowy, woman seated at center next to a partially hidden figure wearing a patterned coat; bottom image in black and white--negative; top image colored:  light yellow ground, pink object on woman\'s lap, woman had brown hair and wears green and yellow coat
